html:
2025-0513
2025-06-13FINAuditor General ActAgreements entered into by the Government of Canada Order requesting that the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA (1) perform the review provided for in the agreements to amend the tax collection agreements between the Government of Canada and the government of each of Ontario, New Brunswick, British Columbia, Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador and Nunavut; and (2) provide the Minister of Finance a report on the results of that review.N/A
subject: Agreements entered into by the Government of Canada
precis: Order requesting that the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA (1) perform the review provided for in the agreements to amend the tax collection agreements between the Government of Canada and the government of each of Ontario, New Brunswick, British Columbia, Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador and Nunavut; and (2) provide the Minister of Finance a report on the results of that review.
